Grimmler/Rex/Firearm/Smokescreen/Perndabot:



Rex and Firearm kept their weapons aimed at Brightblade, Grimmler walked over 
to her.

"Alright, don't try anything, or you'll end up looking like molten slag." he 
warned, grabbing at BrightBlade's left arm and trying to lift her up.

---

Smokescreen popped his head in the room, hearing no more weapons fire, seeing 
that the other Maximals were in the process of apprehending the intruder, 
who's cloaking device had obviously malfunctioned or something.  

======

Perndabot could see the outline of the Cybertronian Fire, so he decided to 
land so no one could see him.  Letting his feet hit the grassy ground, he 
stopped moving for a moment.  How was he going to help Bright Blade?  He had 
no idea where she'd be coming from.  No idea how to get into the base.

Although, she'd probably tell him where she was, and if to provide cover 
fire.  He took out his missile launcher, getting on his abdomen.  He began 
crawling for the Cybertronian Fire.  He would take a position, and wait for a 
message.  If he didn't get one soon, maybe he could convince the rest of the 
Alliance to aid him, after all, Bright Blade MUST'VE found something of 
importance.
